ygData.subject: Re: Begging taunt
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh.. it won t work.   I mean there may be a slight taunting factor involved with it... but it is SO slight... one whack with your mace would do more to taunt
ygData.messageBody:
Heh.. it won't work. I mean there may be a slight taunting factor involved
with it... but it is SO slight...
one whack with your mace would do more to taunt a monster than begging
would, and you know that our mace doesn't do much to taunt. At any rate,
as clerics we don't really want to taunt. Especially at higher levels, we
just lose precious hit points too fast when monsters start double and triple
attacking for 90 dmg. =)

-Eachann Bronzeleaf
-Cleric of Tunare, Tarew Marr

----- Original Message -----
From: PHAEDRA WHITLOCK <PWHITLOCK@...>
To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>; <EQ-Rangers@onelist.com>;
<EQ-Shadowknights@onelist.com>; <EQRogues@onelist.com>;
<EQ_Rogue@onelist.com>; <eq_shadowknights@onelist.com>;
<shadow-striders@onelist.com>; <Windriders@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, February 16, 2000 9:22 AM
Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Begging taunt


> From: "PHAEDRA WHITLOCK" <PWHITLOCK@...>
>
> Anyone tried this? It sounds interesting.
>
> Shannyn t'Daisemi
>
>
>
> From: <Tilgen1@...>
> To: Multiple recipients of list sisterhood <sisterhood@...>
>
> > A) Can't taunt as well as a warrior
>
> I recently heard that a tank should also have the beg command hot keyed.
> This adds an extra taunt. Annoy the mob by begging from it. I thought it
> was a hilarious idea.
>
> Hugs and snuggles, Feradwynn Moonspinner
>
>
>
